tests.title: Login Page - Load and Display
tests.description: Verify that the login page loads correctly and displays all required elements: title, description, email field, password field, login button, and register link.

tests.title: Login Page - Form Validation
tests.description: Verify that the login form validates empty fields and shows appropriate error messages.

tests.title: Login Page - Valid Login
tests.description: Verify that a valid user can log in successfully and is redirected to the appropriate page.

tests.title: Login Page - Invalid Credentials
tests.description: Verify that login with invalid credentials shows an error message.

tests.title: Register Page - Load and Display
tests.description: Verify that the register page loads correctly and displays all required elements: title, description, email, password, first name, last name fields, and register button.

tests.title: Register Page - Valid Registration
tests.description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid data.

tests.title: Organization Setup Page - Load and Display
tests.description: Verify that the organization setup page loads correctly after registration.

tests.title: Organization Setup - Create Organization
tests.description: Verify that a user can create an organization successfully.

tests.title: All Issues Page - Load and Display
tests.description: Verify that the all issues page loads correctly and displays the issue list, filter bar, and sidebar.

tests.title: All Issues Page - Filter by Status
tests.description: Verify that issues can be filtered by status using the filter bar.

tests.title: All Issues Page - Filter by Priority
tests.description: Verify that issues can be filtered by priority using the filter bar.

tests.title: All Issues Page - Search Issues
tests.description: Verify that issues can be searched using the search input.

tests.title: All Issues Page - Create Issue Button
tests.description: Verify that the create issue button is visible and clicking it opens the create issue dialog.

tests.title: All Issues Page - Create Issue
tests.description: Verify that a new issue can be created with valid data.

steps.value: This is a test issue created by TestSprite

tests.title: All Issues Page - Click Issue Card
tests.description: Verify that clicking on an issue card opens the issue detail view.

tests.title: My Issues Page - Load and Display
tests.description: Verify that the my issues page loads correctly and displays issues assigned to the current user.

tests.title: Inbox Page - Load and Display
tests.description: Verify that the inbox page loads correctly and displays pending triage issues.

tests.title: Projects Page - Load and Display
tests.description: Verify that the projects page loads correctly and displays the project list, filter options, and project cards.

tests.title: Projects Page - Create Project Button
tests.description: Verify that clicking the create project button opens the create project dialog.

tests.title: Projects Page - Create Project
tests.description: Verify that a new project can be created with valid data.

steps.value: This is a test project created by TestSprite

tests.title: Projects Page - Click Project Card
tests.description: Verify that clicking on a project card navigates to the project detail page.

tests.title: Project Detail Page - Load and Display
tests.description: Verify that the project detail page loads correctly and displays project information, features, updates, and resources tabs.

tests.title: Project Detail Page - Navigate Tabs
tests.description: Verify that clicking on different tabs (Features, Updates, Resources) updates the view accordingly.

tests.title: Project Detail Page - Create Update
tests.description: Verify that a project update can be created.

steps.value: This is a test update from TestSprite

steps.selector: [data-update-content='This is a test update from TestSprite']

tests.title: Project Detail Page - Create Resource
tests.description: Verify that a project resource can be created.

tests.title: Features Page - Load and Display
tests.description: Verify that the features page loads correctly and displays the feature list and kanban board.

tests.title: Features Page - Create Feature Button
tests.description: Verify that clicking the create feature button opens the create feature dialog.

tests.title: Features Page - Create Feature
tests.description: Verify that a new feature can be created with valid data.

steps.value: This is a test feature created by TestSprite

tests.title: Features Page - Drag and Drop Feature
tests.description: Verify that features can be dragged and dropped between kanban columns.

tests.title: AI Generator Page - Load and Display
tests.description: Verify that the AI generator page loads correctly and displays the idea submission form and core pillars.

tests.title: AI Generator Page - Submit Idea
tests.description: Verify that an idea can be submitted for AI processing.

steps.value: This is a test idea for AI generation

tests.title: AI Generator Page - Answer Questions
tests.description: Verify that validation questions can be answered.

tests.title: AI Generator Page - Generate Blueprint
tests.description: Verify that a blueprint can be generated after validation.

tests.title: Settings Page - Load and Display
tests.description: Verify that the settings page loads correctly and displays profile, organization, and team settings tabs.

tests.title: Settings Page - Navigate Tabs
tests.description: Verify that clicking on different settings tabs updates the view.

tests.title: Settings Page - Update Profile
tests.description: Verify that user profile can be updated.

tests.title: Sidebar Navigation - All Menu Items
tests.description: Verify that all sidebar menu items are visible and clickable.

tests.title: Sidebar Navigation - Click Menu Items
tests.description: Verify that clicking sidebar menu items navigates to the correct pages.

tests.title: User Menu - Toggle
tests.description: Verify that clicking the user menu toggles the dropdown.

tests.title: User Menu - Logout
tests.description: Verify that clicking logout from the user menu logs the user out and redirects to login page.

tests.title: Command Palette - Open
tests.description: Verify that pressing Ctrl+K or clicking the command palette button opens the command palette.

tests.title: Command Palette - Search and Navigate
tests.description: Verify that the command palette can search for and navigate to pages.

tests.title: Issue Detail - Add Comment
tests.description: Verify that a comment can be added to an issue.

steps.value: This is a test comment from TestSprite

steps.selector: [data-comment-content='This is a test comment from TestSprite']

tests.title: Issue Detail - Update Status
tests.description: Verify that issue status can be updated from the detail panel.

tests.title: Issue Detail - Update Priority
tests.description: Verify that issue priority can be updated from the detail panel.

tests.title: Issue Detail - View Activities
tests.description: Verify that activity history can be viewed for an issue.

tests.title: Notifications - Bell Icon
tests.description: Verify that the notification bell icon is visible and clicking it shows notifications.

tests.title: Notifications - Mark as Read
tests.description: Verify that notifications can be marked as read.

tests.title: Responsive - Mobile Navigation
tests.description: Verify that the mobile navigation menu works correctly on small screens.

tests.title: Responsive - Mobile Sidebar
tests.description: Verify that the sidebar is hidden on mobile and can be toggled.
